textBox.richText: Recently I’ve been having some ideas about plans for my site. Seeing as I’m getting more involved with research at school and that I am even now in the beginning steps of starting my own experiment, I am going to make a whole new section to my site that will contain all the details of my scientific endeavors! Now I’ll finally have something that can mostly stand alone by itself without needing to be updated all the time (not that I update this blog too often anyway). Expect these new exciting changes to be occurring within the next few months, seeing as I am still lazy when it comes to messing around with this stuff and I am also not too sure how to properly set this up which means I will be needing some outside assistance from a very well-established computer-man.
